Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier police activity Laramie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier police activity Laramie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Diversey/Racine
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Wellington, Sheffield and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Diversey, Racine, Wellington, Sheffield and Diversey due to street blockage near Diversey/Racine.

Allow extra travel time.
